body: well a few of u may remember me from last year is u still play i quit a year ago and just saw a video from avicus and it brought back memories so i decided to pop in and say hi! Can someone tell me how the taff has changed and all that? Does anyone i used to play with still play? AMA if i come back on website?

replies.body: Ayy welcome back. Still remember you from a long time ago, does your brother still play?
